name: briceburg/silverstripe-flexifields
description: A collection of helpful SilverStripe fields, optionally leveraged by the flexi-* modules.

suggest.briceburg/silverstripe-flexiaddress: Add microdata friendly addresses and phone numbers to your SilverStripe objects.
suggest.briceburg/silverstripe-flexiform: Add CMS configurable forms to your SilverStripe objects.
